title: Chicago's Society of Typographic Arts presents Archive06
content:
Archive06 [www.sta-archive.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015065219/http:/www.sta-archive.com/ "www.sta-archive.com") is the competition developed to recognize outstanding achievement in Chicago graphic design during 2005. It’s different from other competitions because it:

• focuses exclusively on Chicago designers,

• signifies winners as leaders among Chicago designers,

• promotes winners to Chicago’s design community,

• promotes winners to Chicago’s business community,

• and - most importantly - places winners in the Chicago Design Archive [www.chicagodesignarchive.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015065219/http:/www.chicagodesignarchive.org/ "www.chicagodesignarchive.org") alongside Laszlo Moholy-Nagy, Frederic Goudy, Oswald Cooper and many other great typographers and designers.

It’s sponsored by Chicago’s Society of Typographic Arts [www.sta-chicago.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015065219/http:/www.sta-chicago.org/ "www.sta-chicago.org") – the fun, gracious, straightforward and accessible organization dedicated to preserving the traditions of Chicago design and building a vibrant Chicago design community.

Deadline is March 17.

Interested? Then check out the Archive06 page at www.sta-archive.com.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015065219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/STA-Archive06.gif)
author: bobzeni
